import Image1 from'../images/historia.png';import Image2 from'../images/masscomweb.png';import Image3 from'../images/jiwapendekar.png';import Image4 from'../images/giddenhem.png';import Image5 from'../images/poster.png';import Image6 from'../images/tetraevent.png';export var singleProjectData={ProjectHeader:{title:'Project Management',publishDate:'Jan 10, 2024',tags:' Summary Projects'},ProjectImages:[{id:1,title:'Kabul Project Management UI',img:Image1},{id:2,title:'Kabul Project Management UI',img:Image2},{id:3,title:'Kabul Project Management UI',img:Image3}],ProjectInfo:{ClientHeading:'List of Client',CompanyInfo:[{id:1,title:'Spectrum Studio (My own)',details:'Masscom faculty UiTM Alor Gajah'},{id:2,title:'Jiwa Pendekar Advertising Agency',details:''}],ObjectivesHeading:'Software',ObjectivesDetails:'Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Illustrator, Figma, Canva, Unreal Engine, Blender, Visual Studio',Technologies:[{title:'Tools & Technologies',techs:['HTML','CSS','JavaScript','React (Beginner)','TailwindCSS (Beginner)']}],ProjectDetailsHeading:'Experience',ProjectDetails:[{id:1,details:'Historia - Final Year Project'},{id:2,details:'As my final year project during my Diploma in New Media, I developed a game called Historia using Unreal Engine. My responsibilities included being the main developer, designing levels, and creating 3D models. The project required us to create a complete game that was beta tested by students in our university. This project honed my skills in game development, level design, and 3D modeling, and provided invaluable experience in bringing a game from concept to beta testing.'},{id:3,details:'Official Website for Mass Communication Faculty'},{id:4,details:'I worked with my faculty to develop and maintain an official website for the Mass Communication Faculty. My tasks included redesigning the website to improve its layout and usability, handling graphic design to ensure visual appeal, and maintaining the website to keep it updated with the latest information. This project involved collaboration with faculty members to ensure that the website met their needs and was an informative resource for students and visitors.'},{id:5,details:'Social Media Content Creation'},{id:6,details:'I collaborated with clients to handle their social media presence, creating new content aimed at engaging their target audience and achieving viral reach. My responsibilities included directing video shoots, editing videos, and ensuring that the content was effective and met the clients goals. One of the key challenges was managing time and coordinating with team members. To address this, we implemented a planner to schedule shoots and posts, ensuring timely completion of tasks. This experience gave me firsthand insight into working in a social media environment and the strategies needed to create successful content.'},{id:7,details:'Other works:'},{id:8,details:'Ive also did some other project as practice which are graphic design, animation, 3d modelling, storyboard, game jam and much more to be added later on :)'}],SocialSharingHeading:'',SocialSharing:[]},RelatedProject:{title:'Related Projects',Projects:[{id:1,title:'Game dev',img:Image4},{id:2,title:'Website',img:Image5},{id:3,title:'Social Media',img:Image6},{id:4,title:'Event',img:Image3}]}};
